Hey,

I just took a shower and had to think about KSP (nerdalert xD). Sometimes I feel like the whole game how it is now, and will be after release, is just a demo version (including mods). I mean if you would ask me, I definitely would say KSP is the best game ever, but in my imagination there are endless possibilities and ideas how the game could be many years later.

I really just hope the game will be improved after release for a very long time.

I don't know, I just had to write this down and share my thoughts

They will polish up what currently in the game and then they'll release it. After a while there'll be an update which brings multiplayer.

KSP2? Don't know but if it'll come I'll get it. ^^
